Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Belmont/Inner Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: EB 77 Belmont buses are temp. rerouted via Belmont, Inner Lake Shore Dr., Fullerton, Canon Dr., Diversey and Sheridan: near Belmont/inner Lake Shore Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Inner Lake Shore Drive, Fullerton, Canon Drive, Diversey and Sheridan: due to, street blockage near Belmont/inner Lake Shore Drive.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
